Class FileChooserUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • saf.core.ui.util.FileChooserUtilities

  • public class FileChooserUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for gui file and directory selection.

    Author:

        public static java.io.File getOpenFile(java.io.File dir)
        Gets a file via an Open File dialog.
        Parameters:
        dir - the initial path to display in the dialog
        Returns:
        the selected file or null if no file was selected.

        Gets a file via an Open File dialog.

      • getFile

        public static java.io.File getFile(java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String approveText,
                   java.io.File dir)
        Gets a File via a File Dialog.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the dialog
        approveText - the approve button text such as "Open" or "Save"
        dir - the initial path to display in the dialog
        Returns:
        the selected file or null if no file was selected.

      • getFile

        public static java.io.File getFile(java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String approveText,
                   java.io.File dir,
                   javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter filter)
        Gets a File via a File Dialog.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the dialog
        approveText - the approve button text such as "Open" or "Save"
        dir - the initial path to display in the dialog
        filter - the file filter to filter the displayed files
        Returns:
        the selected file or null if no file was selected.
